name: Corona Simulator (stupidgameslab)
description:
CORONA FLY

Once upon a time in a land far far away it was a beautiful day, not a single cloud in the sky. A perfect day for self-isolation, but Misha Nachihaev had other plans. He left his home without a mask, touched all of the doorknobs, licked the nearest sign pole and scratched his face. And in the end to bring his point across, he loudly sneezed without covering his mouth. Hence, our character was born.

A SHORT GAME BY STUPID GAMES LAB

What do you do during quarantine? Develop games! 

A short game for those who are tired and sick of being threatened by Covid-19 and just want to laugh about it.

FEATURES
  • 15 levels of fun
  • Epic boss battles
  • Soviet spiders
  • Challenging levels
CONTROLS KeysControlsWASD&Arrow keysMovementSpacebarInfectRMBInteractEscPause

DISCLAIMER

By no means this game was meant to offend anyone or to make fun of the current pandemic. It is serious and you have to take serious care of yourself and your environment. 
All characters are fictional and any resemblance is a coincidental.

The game was made only to help people go through the current pandemic by bringing some fun content that includes the COVID-19 virus.
